communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: In my journey, I've faced constant rejection and ridicule, pushing me deeper into anger and isolation. My life is dominated by the struggle against a society that seems designed to keep me down, fueling my resentment towards women and the social hierarchy that I believe oppresses me. Each day, my frustration grows, pushing me towards more aggressive actions online.
narratives.p_intro: I'm incel_0001_c84f44, the voice of the downtrodden. I'm here to challenge the status quo, to call out the unfairness of the dating world and the societal structures that favor others over me. My words might be harsh, but they're the truth as I see it, and I won't back down.
